# What is this

This is an npm package based off of DesignCourse's youtube tutorial.

# Installation

`npm i dc-npm-sw`

Then...

```
import { BorderWizard } from 'dc-npm-sw'

BorderWizard({
  borderType: 'color',
  padding: true,
})
```

## Options

* *borderType* _color || black_ (Defaults to black)
* *padding* _boolean_ (Defaults to false)
